item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
McBride Logo McBride plc is a leading British-based manufacturing business, noted as being Europe’s biggest maker of retailer own brand household goods. The business also provides contract manufacturing for brand owners. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE SmallCap Index. Source
You can download theMcBridelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: McBride
item.description: McBride plc is a leading British-based manufacturing business, noted as being Europe’s biggest maker of retailer own brand household goods. The business also provides contract manufacturing for brand owners. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE SmallCap Index. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Dove Logo
Dove is an American personal care brand owned by Unilever originating in the United States. Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues.
You can download theDovelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dove
item.description: Dove is an American personal care brand owned by Unilever originating in the United States. Dove products are manufactured in Argentina, Australia, Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, Germany, India, Indonesia, Israel, Ireland, Japan, Mexico, Netherlands, Pakistan, Philippines, Poland, South Africa, South Korea, Thailand, Turkey and the United States. Source About Dove For over a decade, Dove’ve been working to make beauty a source of confidence, not anxiety, and here’s where the journey continues.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Oral-B Logo
Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source
You can download theOral-Blogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Oral-B
item.description: Oral-B is a brand of oral hygiene products, including toothpastes, toothbrushes, electric toothbrushes, and mouthwashes. The brand has been in business since the invention of the Hutson toothbrush in 1950. It has been owned by American multinational Procter & Gamble (P&G) since 2006. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tampax Logo
Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source
You can download theTampaxlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tampax
item.description: Tampax is a brand of tampon currently owned by Procter & Gamble and sold in over 100 countries. Both the brand and the product were invented by Dr. Earle Haas, who filed a patent in 1931. The original product was designed from the start as flushable and biodegradeable. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tide Logo
Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source
You can download theTidelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tide
item.description: Tide is a laundry detergent owned and produced by American multinational Procter & Gamble. Introduced in 1946, it is the highest selling detergent brand in the world, with an estimated 14.3 percent of the global market. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Uniliver Logo
Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source
You can download theUniliverlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Uniliver
item.description: Unilever is a British-Dutch transnational consumer goods company co-headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and Rotterdam, Netherlands. Its products include food and beverages (about 40 per cent of its revenue), cleaning agents, beauty products, and personal care products. It is Europe’s seventh most valuable company. Unilever is one of the oldest multinational companies; its products are available in around 190 countries. Source Source
